text: Yevgeny Aleksandrovich Kozlovsky (; 7 May 1929 â€“ 21 February 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union. He was Minister of Geology from 1975 to 1989. Kozlovsky died on 21 February 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian communist politicians Category:Soviet politicians Category:Russian geologists Category:Gomel Region
title: Yevgeny Kozlovsky
